Articles.Content: i am exited for my pc to blow up!
I'm excited for interstellar travel and the Rask and Rusk planetary system, it seems like it would be a pretty cool place to make new bases!
Those new wings!
I'm excited for new Kerbally goodness!
I am excited about all the mods that we will get!

If there is one thing I'm most excited for about ksp 2 it has to be seeing what abominations I am able to make that make it into the stars literally and metaphorically. That is if they make it off the ground first. Everything else is pretty cool I guess.
I am excited for KSP2
I'm excited to see how hard I can break the game
I'm most excited to win it for free.
I'm in
I'm too poor to buy this game on realease
I am exited to be able to build massive interstellar starships and have epic space battles in multiplayer!
I'm excited for all the QoL changes, being able to explore new stars, colonies, and the new (stock) graphics.
I am exited about the new wings

Interstellar. The buildout effort just to get there. Dealing with Comm lag between systems. Coop Multiplayer!!! Lots of things really.

But first I’m happy to get going and get up to speed with new stuff. Get local system set up and ready to go.

The journey is the point.
Most excited about all of the experimentation I could do, including with the new parts and part colours, wings, and framerates!

Honestly, what I'm most excited for (as I understand) isn't even part of the main Early Access launch.

I'm honestly most curious, about the Interstellar element, and how it will be handled in terms of the scale.  I know some stuff about this was already said, but trying to balance the scale of interstellar travel with the normal space agency operations in the local system, will be nearly as tight in threading a needle, as actually reaching another world, as one of the devs pointed out in an old promo video.

Well, that and seeing the rapid partially-planned disassembly of trying a couple dozen kilometer deep airbreak through the nearest gas giant. Maybe eventually doing that with an interstellar vessel going at potentially relativistic speeds. All hail to the Kraken!
Most excited for colonies and new rescource management
I am really excited about the graphics and overall load times improval. Can't wait for all the new parts and especially those landing legs look so cool!
I'm excited for colonies and interstellar. can't wait to build colonies on planets in other star system

Very excited about the new rover cockpits.

Edited February 23, 2023 by Akagi
spel cheack
I am most excited for multiplayer and space races between rival agencies!
I'm excited for the new way of building new assemblies and subassemblies in the VAB
Really excited for the (hopefully) eventual game optimization, allowing me to run the game with 160+ mods without waiting years to load everything!
I am super hyped to just play with my girlfriend and find all the new easter eggs
